data.title: European Alternative Fuels Observatory
data.text:
Access the results of the EAFO Consumer Monitor and Survey 2023

The European Alternative Fuels Observatory (EAFO) is the European Commission's key reference portal for alternative fuels, infrastructure and vehicles in Europe.

Interactive maps

View up-to date information on refueling/recharging stations across the EU, as well as other data visualisations on the interactive map.

Knowledge platform

Recent news

EAFO Data Update Notification 2024 August

We are pleased to inform you that the data on EAFO has been updated in alignment with the latest available figures, June 2024 for AF registrations and July 2024 for AF infrastructure.

2024-08-19

Europe EV Sales Analysis: Key Insights on June 2024 Registrations

Juneâ€™s plugin vehicle market share stood at 22%, with BEVs alone accounting for 16%. This result maintained the 2024 plugin vehicle share at 21% (14% for BEVs).

2024-08-14

Intercity Electric Buses: Current Landscape and Future Prospects in Europe

In 2023, Europe saw the registration of just 200 intercity electric buses, a stark contrast to the more than 6,000 municipal battery-electric buses registered in the same period.

2024-08-05
